ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities

Class ImageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities.ImageUtils

  • public final class ImageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-26. Provides methods relating to creating images of the statistics managed by the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static android.graphics.Bitmap createImageFromGame(boolean[][][] pinState, boolean[][] fouls, short gameScore, boolean isManual)
      Creates an image, writing the game scores and individual ball values in a standard format.

      Loads the data of each game in a series and creates a single image to.
      static android.net.Uri insertImage(android.content.ContentResolver cr, android.graphics.Bitmap source, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description)
      A copy of the Android internals insertImage method, this method populates the meta data with DATE_ADDED and DATE_TAKEN.

    • Method Detail

      • createImageFromGame

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createImageFromGame(boolean[][][] pinState,
                                                          boolean[][] fouls,
                                                          short gameScore,
                                                          boolean isManual)
        Creates an image, writing the game scores and individual ball values in a standard format.
        Parameters:
        pinState - state of the pins of each ball in each frame
        fouls - indicates whether a foul was invoked for each ball
        gameScore - final score of the game
        isManual - indicates if the score of the game was manually set
        Returns:
        a formatted bitmap containing the game data

      • createImageFromSeries

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createImageFromSeries(android.content.Context context,
                                                            long seriesId)
        Loads the data of each game in a series and creates a single image to.
        Parameters:
        context - context used to get an instance of the database
        seriesId - id of the series to load game from
        Returns:
        an image of each games' data and score

      • insertImage

        public static android.net.Uri insertImage(android.content.ContentResolver cr,
                                          android.graphics.Bitmap source,
                                          java.lang.String title,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        A copy of the Android internals insertImage method, this method populates the meta data with DATE_ADDED and DATE_TAKEN. This fixes a common problem where media that is inserted manually gets saved at the end of the gallery (because date is not populated).
        Parameters:
        cr - n/a
        source - n/a
        title - n/a
        description - n/a
        Returns:
        n/a
        See Also:
        MediaStore.Images.Media.insertImage(android.content.ContentResolver, Bitmap, String, String)
